title: Critical path in use
creator_credit: Sam Napier-Bell and British Productivity Council
brief_description: In planning a new undertaking, a chart is made to show each move as a separate step in an integral plan. This technique helps to solve many problems on paper before they occur in practice. Shows the drawing up after discussion of a Critical Path Analysis for work on a major project. The advantages of the system for all units are emphasised, and reference is made to the British export effort.
